new entry "ExtraAttack_FourElements"
type "PassiveData"
using "ExtraAttack"
data "Conditions" "(context.HasContextFlag(StatsFunctorContext.OnCast) and (ExtraAttackSpellCheck() or SpellId('Projectile_RayOfFrost_Monk') or SpellId('Target_ShockingGrasp_Monk')) and HasUseCosts('ActionPoint', true) and not Tagged('EXTRA_ATTACK_BLOCKED',context.Source) and not HasStatus('SLAYER_PLAYER',context.Source) and not HasStatus('SLAYER_PLAYER_10',context.Source) and TurnBased(context.Source)) or (context.HasContextFlag(StatsFunctorContext.OnStatusRemoved) and StatusId('INITIAL_ATTACK_TECHNICAL') and TurnBased()) or (context.HasContextFlag(StatsFunctorContext.OnStatusApplied) and StatusId('EXTRA_ATTACK_Q'))"

new entry "ImprovedElementalCasting"
type "PassiveData"
using "ImprovedElementalCasting"
data "Properties" "Highlighted"
data "ExtraDescription" "h9926c2b2gf6b2g42c3g8a9dg942c9072fa76"
data "Boosts" "IF(IEC('Karlach_Infernal_Fury',context.Source)):DamageBonus(2d4, Fire);IF(IEC('LOW_Astarion_VampireAscendant',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d10, Necrotic);IF(IEC('MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodthirsty_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(2, Necrotic);IF(IEC('MAG_Cold_UnarmedAttack_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d4, Cold);IF(IEC('MAG_Fire_UnarmedAttack_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d4, Fire);IF(IEC('MAG_Force_SoulCatchingDamage_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d10, Force);IF(IEC('MAG_Force_Tyrant_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d8, Force);IF(IEC('MAG_Force_UnarmedAttack_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d4, Force);IF(IEC('MAG_Infernal_Metal_Gloves_FireDamage_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d6, Necrotic);IF(IEC('MAG_Lightning_UnarmedAttack_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d4, Lightning);IF(IEC('MAG_Monk_Magic_Boots_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(WisdomModifier);IF(IEC('MAG_Radiant_UnarmedAttack_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d4, Radiant);IF(IEC('MAG_Thunder_UnarmedAttack_Passive',context.Source)):DamageBonus(1d4, Thunder);IF(IEC('TavernBrawler',context.Source)):DamageBonus(StrengthModifier);"
